name: Cooking Festival
description:
🌽🍖🍆BAKE, FRY and GRILL🌽🍖🍆 your way AROUND THE WORLD!🗽

Cooking Festival is a simple point and click time management game.

As the Chef in your restaurant you combine ingredients, serve dishes and upgrade your kitchen to increase efficiency and keep your customers satisfied. You have to hurry up as waiting for food makes customers grumpy and they will leave when waiting for too long. Make use of multiple stoves and ovens in your kitchen but stay focused as burned food will have to be thrown out!

Five worlds consisting of four restaurants each with each restaurant having between 10 and 60 levels to complete (480 levels in total!) along with special buildings, characters and challenges to unlock that bring many hours of cooking fun!

👉You’re the MASTER CHEF the cooking world has been waiting for - the most talented, well trained, and most promising 💥FOOD ARTIST💥 in the known universe!

Whip up some HOMEMADE PANCAKES, grill 🍖🍖🍖JUICY RIBS🍖🍖🍖, bake aromatic original 🍕Italian PIZZAS🍕, and serve delicious 🍦ICE CREAM🍦 that everyone loves!

🌽🍖🍆Cooking is incredibly easy - just TAP & Serve 🍆🍗🌽

Cook whatever CUISINE YOU LIKE, and have FUN!

IMAGINE YOURSELF:

EXPLORING THE WORLD:
👯Visit San Francisco
😎Naples
👮Berlin
🗼 Check out stunning landmarks wherever you go
💥Visit various Food Festivals!
😋 Unlock additional ingredients for AMAZING NEW DISHES!

MEETING SPECIAL CUSTOMERS SUCH AS:
🐉 Festival Dragon
🐻 Fluffy Bear
🔥 Lava Lady
😻And so many more— serve them well, and receive a SPECIAL BOOST! 💥

DOWNLOAD COOKING FESTIVAL NOW, grab your wok, temper your frying pan, sharpen your knives, and dive into the world of FOOD, TRAVEL and 🙏FAME🙏!
